Dave Skinner wrote:

> does 1.4 have the new filter model implemented?

Yes sir.

Go to profiles.  See 'deciding-profile'.  Base a job on it.  Check out 
the new 'DecidingScope'.  See how you can add and remove 'DecideRules' 
in the new submodules screen.  Configure them in the Settings screen.

There is also a 'DecidingFilter' that can be added anywhere a filter can 
be added to the processing chain.  DecideRules can be chained inside of 
a DecidingFilter.

Check it out.
St.Ack

>
